EmailTemplate.name: 06-28-22 RET Freshop Webinar Thank you email.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for joining us for the NCR and Progressive Grocer webinar! We hope you gained insights that will propel your eCommerce solution forward and help you understand the key trends propelled by the pandemic that are here to stay. Remember, you need an eCommerce solution that: - Is Cloud-Based - Supports Advanced Picking & Fulfillment - Is API-First - Offers Detailed Reports - Is from a Single Vendor That solution is NCR Freshop <[[https://www.ncr.com/freshop]]>. With NCR Freshop, your business will be able to deliver a differentiated online shopping experience—that lets you own your customer experience and stay consistent with your brand—even through your digital channels. See what NCR Freshop can do for you ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Contact us to learn more. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/contact-us]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
